meals.regular: don't forget to pack a meal
meals.long: you may need to pack a meal and a snack

heat-description.comfortable: The temperature will be pretty comfortable for this ride.
heat-description.verycold: This ride will be very cold. Be sure to have gloves and wear insulating layers.

precipitation.insignificant: No need for the waterproof gear.
precipitation.slight: You might pack the rain gear just to be safe
precipitation.possible: It is highly recommended that you have a way to keep thing dry.
